title: WinAppDriver - Create Screenshot Logs using UITestActionLog.html
body: I would like to be able to have screenshots for each and every action for a WinAppDriver like I had with CodedUI via UITestActionLog.html see https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj159363.aspx for what I am looking for.

comments.body: I really hope the OP has followed up separately. If not, please note this comment was accidentally posted in the wrong place: Check out the WinAppDriver Github at https://github.com/Microsoft/WinAppDriver and raise an issue :)
